description.narrative: For GGF funds will allow Centro de Estudios sobre Tecnologias Apropriadas de la Argentina (CETAAR) to continue its efforts in reducing the use of pesticides and promote agroecology in Argentina. The group will focus its efforts to reduce pesticide use on educating community members and policy makers on the impacts of pesticides on ecosystems and human health, coordinate outreach activities with other NGOs, and work with various universities to gather information on pesticide use to disseminate to key stakeholders. In terms of its efforts to promote alternatives to pesticide use, CETAAR will train farmers on sustainable pest management and natural fertilizer use, educate communities on the problems with monoculture farming, and work with constituents to develop markets and certifications for organic agricultural products.
